snippet.title: Aarik and The Ruined Kingdom - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2687300/Aarik_And_The_Ruined_Kingdom

Guide Aarik through wreck and ruin in this relaxing perspective puzzle adventure where the puzzle is your environment. Using your father's crown repair, rework and rewind to mend your broken world.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShatterProof30
Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@shatterproof.game
Website: https://www.aarikgame.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/KkdH4FvPah

#AarikAndTheRuinedKingdom #ShatterproofGames #Aarik #Puzzle
